RAEXIR21FileHeader.PublishComment: IR21 Update from Airtel Tanzania PLC - TZACT

RoutingInfo.AdditionalInformation: SIGNALLING SYSTEM NO. 7 ACCESS SOLUTION Initial solution: D The IMSI complies with GSM 03.03 and CCITT E.212 and has a length of 15 digits. It is constructed as follows MCC=640, MNC=05, MSIN= XYABCDEFGH where XY identify HLR, ABCDEFGH identifies subscriber Translation of IMSI to MGT.For a Airtel subscriber, the following translation must take place:MCC = 640 -> CC = 255; MNC = 05 -> NDC = 78 INTERNATIONAL SMS HUB FOR TERMINATING TO AIRTEL TANZANIA: INDIA ABI
